TITLE: Episode 81 - Hollers, Squalor, and the Making of America with Thaddeus Russell
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are graced with the presence of a true historian and bucker of the system, Mr. Thaddeus Russell. Join us as we discuss history, philosophy, the state of the world, Christianity, culture, our rebel roots, and find some hope in the chaos.
